definition: point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: The rifle is fitted with a 30-round magazine and can fire single shots or bursts.
sentences.chinese: 步枪配备有一个30发弹匣和能点射或连射。

sentences.english: The calculation of antiaircraft gun burst firing kill probability is very complex and needs to be simplified in some ways.
sentences.chinese: 高炮点射毁歼概率计算很复杂且需做许多简化处理。

sentences.english: Much of it is what has been aptly described as " machine-gunning with scraps".
sentences.chinese: 其中许多被贴切地形容为“机关枪点射”。

definition: to rake with machine gunfire/to strafe/to machine-gun down
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots
